think what's the point
the answer is it changes their lives it

proudly wrote her name in Tamil on a

write mean to you and she said no I can
I can see the destination of the bus

I don't have to ask somebody where that

empowerment is what literacy gives
people in a very fundamental and real

we've actually enrolled more kids and we

69 percent by the tenth grade
39% and
College our gross enrolment ratios about

we're doing that we're now rolling out

they can go back to a university if not

and they go off on you're useful trade

out-of-the-box learning to create I know
we're famous for jugaad right you google

more relevant to our conditions we need

0 remember how the Romans used to write

and that came into the 0sh India which

hasn't studied before a mind in other
words that can react to the bigger
examination called life which doesn't
actually only give you things you've

a mind that doesn't just ask the teacher
why but why not I've actually had a

I have to look through glasses but

something they crack I put them on a lap
when I get up they fall down somebody
steps on them they break in the first
three months of this year I lost or

solution why can't you think that I said
look there is no easy solution because
for a hundred and fifty years glasses
have been made in one way right they
joined together the center they hang
over your ears that's what I find on

that they're not
hangover your years or be joined in the
